Methods.Name: Answers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get all answers on the site.

Methods.Name: AnswersByIds
Methods.ShortDescription: Get answers identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: CommentsOnAnswers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get comments on the answers identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: Badges
Methods.ShortDescription: Get all badges on the site, in alphabetical order.

Methods.Name: BadgesByIds
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the badges identified by ids.

Methods.Name: BadgesByName
Methods.ShortDescription: Get all non-tagged-based badges in alphabetical order.

Methods.Name: BadgeRecipients
Methods.ShortDescription: Get badges recently awarded on the site.

Methods.Name: BadgeRecipientsByIds
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the recent recipients of the given badges.

Methods.Name: BadgesByTag
Methods.ShortDescription: Get all tagged-based badges in alphabetical order.

Methods.Name: Comments
Methods.ShortDescription: Get all comments on the site.

Methods.Name: CommentsByIds
Methods.ShortDescription: Get comments identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: DeleteComment
Methods.ShortDescription: Delete a comment identified by it's id.

Methods.Name: EditComment
Methods.ShortDescription: Edit a comment identified by it's id.

Methods.Name: Events
Methods.ShortDescription: Get recent events that have occurred on the site. Effectively a stream of new users and content.

Methods.Name: Info
Methods.ShortDescription: Get information about the entire site.

Methods.Name: Posts
Methods.ShortDescription: Get all posts (questions and answers) in the system.

Methods.Name: PostsByIds
Methods.ShortDescription: Get all posts identified by a set of ids.  Useful for when the type of post (question or answer) is not known.

Methods.Name: CommentsOnPosts
Methods.ShortDescription: Get comments on the posts (question or answer) identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: CreateComment
Methods.ShortDescription: Create a new comment on the post identified by id.

Methods.Name: RevisionsByIds
Methods.ShortDescription: Get revisions on the set of posts in ids.

Methods.Name: PostsOnSuggestedEdits
Methods.ShortDescription: Get suggested edits on the set of posts in ids.

Methods.Name: Privileges
Methods.ShortDescription: Get all the privileges available on the site.

Methods.Name: Questions
Methods.ShortDescription: Get all questions on the site.

Methods.Name: QuestionsByIds
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the questions identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: AnswersOnQuestions
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the answers to the questions identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: CommentsOnQuestions
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the comments on the questions identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: LinkedQuestions
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the questions that link to the questions identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: RelatedQuestions
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the questions that are related to the questions identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: QuestionsTimeline
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the timelines of the questions identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: FeaturedQuestions
Methods.ShortDescription: Get all questions on the site with active bounties.

Methods.Name: UnansweredQuestions
Methods.ShortDescription: Get all questions the site considers unanswered.

Methods.Name: NoAnswerQuestions
Methods.ShortDescription: Get all questions on the site with  answers.

Methods.Name: RevisionsByGuids
Methods.ShortDescription: Get all revisions identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: Search
Methods.ShortDescription: Search the site for questions meeting certain criteria.

Methods.Name: AdvancedSearch
Methods.ShortDescription: Search the site for questions using most of the on-site search options.

Methods.Name: Similar
Methods.ShortDescription: Search the site based on similarity to a title.

Methods.Name: SuggestedEdits
Methods.ShortDescription: Get all the suggested edits on the site.

Methods.Name: SuggestedEditsByIds
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the suggested edits identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: Tags
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the tags on the site.

Methods.Name: TagsByName
Methods.ShortDescription: Get tags on the site by their names.

Methods.Name: ModeratorOnlyTags
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the tags on the site that only moderators can use.

Methods.Name: RequiredTags
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the tags on the site that fulfill required tag constraints.

Methods.Name: TagSynonyms
Methods.ShortDescription: Get all the tag synonyms on the site.

Methods.Name: FaqsByTags
Methods.ShortDescription: Get frequently asked questions in a set of tags.

Methods.Name: RelatedTags
Methods.ShortDescription: Get related tags, based on common tag pairings.

Methods.Name: SynonymsByTags
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the synonyms for a specific set of tags.

Methods.Name: TopAnswerersOnTags
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the top answer posters in a specific tag, either in the last month or for all time.

Methods.Name: TopAskersOnTags
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the top question askers in a specific tag, either in the last month or for all time.

Methods.Name: WikisByTags
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the wiki entries for a set of tags.

Methods.Name: Users
Methods.ShortDescription: Get all users on the site.

Methods.Name: UsersByIds
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the users identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: AnswersOnUsers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the answers posted by the users identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: BadgesOnUsers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the badges earned by the users identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: CommentsOnUsers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the comments posted by the users identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: CommentsByUsersToUser
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the comments posted by a set of users in reply to another user.

Methods.Name: FavoritesOnUsers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the questions favorited by users identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: MentionsOnUsers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the comments that mention one of the users identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: MergeHistory
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the merges a user's accounts has undergone.

Methods.Name: UserNotifications
Methods.ShortDescription: Get a user's notifications.

Methods.Name: UserUnreadNotifications
Methods.ShortDescription: Get a user's unread notifications.

Methods.Name: PrivilegesOnUsers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the privileges the given user has on the site.

Methods.Name: QuestionsOnUsers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the questions asked by the users identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: FeaturedQuestionsOnUsers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the questions on which a set of users, have active bounties.

Methods.Name: NoAnswerQuestionsOnUsers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the questions asked by a set of users, which have  answers.

Methods.Name: UnacceptedQuestionsOnUsers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the questions asked by a set of users, which have at least one answer but no accepted answer.

Methods.Name: UnansweredQuestionsOnUsers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the questions asked by a set of users, which are not considered to be adequately answered.

Methods.Name: ReputationOnUsers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get a subset of the reputation changes experienced by the users identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: ReputationHistory
Methods.ShortDescription: Get a history of a user's reputation, excluding private events.

Methods.Name: FullReputationHistory
Methods.ShortDescription: Get a full history of a user's reputation.

Methods.Name: SuggestedEditsOnUsers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the suggested edits provided by users identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: TagsOnUsers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the tags that the users (identified by a set of ids) have been active in.

Methods.Name: TopUserAnswersInTags
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the top answers a user has posted on questions with a set of tags.

Methods.Name: TopUserQuestionsInTags
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the top questions a user has posted with a set of tags.

Methods.Name: TimelineOnUsers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get a subset of the actions of that have been taken by the users identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: TopAnswerTagsOnUsers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the top tags (by score) a single user has posted answers in.

Methods.Name: TopQuestionTagsOnUsers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the top tags (by score) a single user has asked questions in.

Methods.Name: WritePermissions
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the write access a user has via the API.

Methods.Name: Moderators
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the users who have moderation powers on the site.

Methods.Name: ElectedModerators
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the users who are active moderators who have also won a moderator election.

Methods.Name: UserInbox
Methods.ShortDescription: Get a user's inbox.

Methods.Name: UserUnreadInbox
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the unread items in a user's inbox.

Methods.Name: Me
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the users identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: MeAnswers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the answers posted by the users identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: MeBadges
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the badges earned by the users identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: MeComments
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the comments posted by the users identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: MeCommentsTo
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the comments posted by a set of users in reply to another user.

Methods.Name: MeFavorites
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the questions favorited by users identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: MeMentioned
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the comments that mention one of the users identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: MeMergeHistory
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the merges a user's accounts has undergone.

Methods.Name: MeNotifications
Methods.ShortDescription: Get a user's notifications.

Methods.Name: MeUnreadNotifications
Methods.ShortDescription: Get a user's unread notifications.

Methods.Name: MePrivileges
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the privileges the given user has on the site.

Methods.Name: MeQuestions
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the questions asked by the users identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: MeFeaturedQuestions
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the questions on which a set of users, have active bounties.

Methods.Name: MeNoAnswerQuestions
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the questions asked by a set of users, which have  answers.

Methods.Name: MeUnacceptedQuestions
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the questions asked by a set of users, which have at least one answer but no accepted answer.

Methods.Name: MeUnansweredQuestions
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the questions asked by a set of users, which are not considered to be adequately answered.

Methods.Name: MeReputation
Methods.ShortDescription: Get a subset of the reputation changes experienced by the users identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: MeReputationHistory
Methods.ShortDescription: Get a history of a user's reputation, excluding private events.

Methods.Name: MeFullReputationHistory
Methods.ShortDescription: Get a full history of a user's reputation.

Methods.Name: MeSuggestedEdits
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the suggested edits provided by users identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: MeTags
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the tags that the users (identified by a set of ids) have been active in.

Methods.Name: MeTagsTopAnswers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the top answers a user has posted on questions with a set of tags.

Methods.Name: MeTagsTopQuestions
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the top questions a user has posted with a set of tags.

Methods.Name: MeTimeline
Methods.ShortDescription: Get a subset of the actions of that have been taken by the users identified by a set of ids.

Methods.Name: MeTopAnswerTags
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the top tags (by score) a single user has posted answers in.

Methods.Name: MeTopQuestionTags
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the top tags (by score) a single user has asked questions in.

Methods.Name: MeWritePermissions
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the write access a user has via the API.

Methods.Name: MeInbox
Methods.ShortDescription: Get a user's inbox.

Methods.Name: MeUnreadInbox
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the unread items in a user's inbox.

Methods.Name: InvalidateAccessTokens
Methods.ShortDescription: Allows an application to dispose of  when it is done with them.

Methods.Name: ReadAccessTokens
Methods.ShortDescription: Allows an application to inspect  it has, useful for debugging.

Methods.Name: ApplicationDeAuthenticate
Methods.ShortDescription: Allows an application to de-authorize itself for a set of users.

Methods.Name: Errors
Methods.ShortDescription: Get descriptions of all the errors that the API could return.

Methods.Name: SimulateError
Methods.ShortDescription: Simulate an API error for testing purposes.

Methods.Name: CreateFilter
Methods.ShortDescription: Create a new .

Methods.Name: ReadFilter
Methods.ShortDescription: Decode a set of filters, useful for debugging purposes.

Methods.Name: Inbox
Methods.ShortDescription: Get a user's inbox, outside of the context of a site.

Methods.Name: InboxUnread
Methods.ShortDescription: Get the unread items in a user's inbox, outside of the context of a site.

Methods.Name: Notifications
Methods.ShortDescription: Get a user's notifications, outside of the context of a site.

Methods.Name: UnreadNotifications
Methods.ShortDescription: Get a user's unread notifications, outside of the context of a site.

Methods.Name: Sites
Methods.ShortDescription: Get all the sites in the Stack Exchange network.

Methods.Name: AssociatedUsers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get a user's associated accounts.

Methods.Name: MeAssociatedUsers
Methods.ShortDescription: Get a user's associated accounts.
